      • newQuestion

        public void newQuestion()
        A new random question is generated from the question bank. The question itself is displayed in a TextView and the options are displayed on buttons.

      • setupButtons

        public void setupButtons()
        Event listeners are activated for the answering options buttons.

      • randomIndex

        public int randomIndex()
        Generate a random number (integer).
        Returns:
        A random integer x, where 0 <= x <= nrQuestions - 1

      • initDbManager

        public void initDbManager()
        Setup the dbManager for this activity.

      • saveScore

        public void saveScore(int change)
        Update the current and total score in the database, relative to the change.
        Parameters:
        change - The change in score. Change is an integer.

      • getScore

        public java.lang.String[] getScore()
        Fetch the current and total score.
        Returns:
        An array of string of length 2 containing // the tmp score and the total score.

      • initScores

        public void initScores()
        Set the current score to 0.

      • showScores

        public void showScores(int lvl)
        Display the current and total score in a TextView.
        Parameters:
        lvl - The current difficulty level.
